verses.text: \sc Lord\sc*, who shall abide in thy tabernacle? Who shall dwell in thy holy hill?
He that walketh uprightly, and worketh righteousness, And speaketh the truth in his heart.
\add He that\add* backbiteth not with his tongue, Nor doeth evil to his neighbour, Nor taketh up a reproach against his neighbour.
In whose eyes a vile \add person\add* is contemned; But he honoureth them that fear the \sc Lord\sc*. \add He that\add* sweareth to \add his own\add* hurt, and changeth not.
\add He that\add* putteth not out his money to usury, Nor taketh reward against the innocent. He that doeth these \add things\add* shall never be moved.
